params.amount0: The amount of token0 sent to the recipient or was paid to mint

params.bottomTick: The lower tick of the position
params.data: Data that passed through the callback
params.desiredLiquidityDelta: The desired amount of liquidity to mint/burn

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.amount0: The delta of the balance of token0 of the pool, exact when negative, minimum when positive
params.amount1: The delta of the balance of token1 of the pool, exact when negative, minimum when positive
params.amountRequired: The amount of the swap, which implicitly configures the swap as exact input (positive), or exact output (negative)
params.data: Data that passed through the callback
params.limitSqrtPrice: The Q64.96 sqrt price limit. If zero for one, the price cannot be less than this value after the swap. If one for zero, the price cannot be greater than this value after the swap
params.recipient: The address to receive the output of the swap
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the swap call
params.zeroToOne: The direction of the swap, true for token0 to token1, false for token1 to token0

params.sqrtPriceX96: The sqrt(price) of the pool as a Q64.96

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.bottomTick: The lower tick of the position
params.data: Data that passed through the callback
params.desiredLiquidityDelta: The desired amount of liquidity to mint/burn
params.recipient: Address to which the liquidity will be assigned in case of a mint or to which tokens will be sent in case of a burn

returns.selector: The function selector for the hook

params.amountRequired: The amount of the swap, which implicitly configures the swap as exact input (positive), or exact output (negative)
params.data: Data that passed through the callback
params.limitSqrtPrice: The Q64.96 sqrt price limit. If zero for one, the price cannot be less than this value after the swap. If one for zero, the price cannot be greater than this value after the swap
params.recipient: The address to receive the output of the swap
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the swap call
params.withPaymentInAdvance: The flag indicating whether the `swapWithPaymentInAdvance` method was called
params.zeroToOne: The direction of the swap, true for token0 to token1, false for token1 to token0

returns.selector: The function selector for the hook

returns._0: config Each bit of the config is responsible for enabling/disabling the hooks. The last bit indicates whether the plugin contains dynamic fees logic
